name: Away From Earth: Titan 2
detailed_description:
StoryLine
After first Titan try, The world is still in danger. Our water is finishing, our world is finishing. We need a new world. For this, we're going to Titan again. As player, you need make titan as livable. You need to make oxygen area, food places and clean water from in-side of Titan. Also to make people live there, you need to create water&electric stations by using your engineer abilities. People will need jobs. You'll need to create them too. Basically, you're last luck of humanity.

GamePlay
You need to start with looting materials. You'll need irons, golds and diamons. Every building needs different materials to craft. You'll need water & food for your self, to do that you need to create Food&Water area. Then you can start creating your colony. Every colony houses have different capacity. Also they all need electric & water. To give them power and water, you need to use water engines and electric engines. You need to connect them each other by using water pipes and electric cables. To connect them, you need to use your engineer abilities. After your houses are done, you need to give people job. To do that, you can create buisness buildings.

Features
  • Level One Colony House: Needs low electric and water. It can handle only one person.

  • Level Two Colony House: Needs medium electric and water. It can handle three people.

  • Level Three Colony House: Needs high electric and water. It can handle five people.

  • Car Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job. Also you can get a car for your self from this building.

  • Ship Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job. Basically it loots materials for you.

  • Quarry: A buisness building to give your 2 of people job. Also this place will loot materials for you.

  • Electric Engine for electric generation and a water engine for water needs.

  • 4 Types of Electric Cables.

  • 4 Types of Water Pipes.

  • Use Lazer Item Looter gun to loot materials.

  • Use destroyer gun to destroy what you've builded.

  • Fly System: You can fly wherever you want easly by pressing [F] key.

short_description: After Titan try, The world is still in danger. Our water is running out. Our world is running out. As a player, you need to make Titan as livable and invite humans from world to Titan. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water&electric systems of Titan. You're last luck of humanity...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
